titles.title: Relating to a national emergency declared by the President on February 15, 2019.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary: This joint resolution terminates the national emergency related to the U.S.-Mexico border, declared by the President on February 15, 2019.
